goal.core.program.actions

Class AdoptOneAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.parser.ParsedObject
      • goal.core.program.actions.Action
        • goal.core.program.actions.MentalAction
          • goal.core.program.actions.AdoptAction
            • goal.core.program.actions.AdoptOneAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IParsedObject, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ParsedObject>

    public class AdoptOneAction
extends AdoptAction
    Adopts a goal by adding it into the GoalBase.

    The preconditions of the adoptone action are:

    • the agent does not already have a 'similar' goal of the same form;
    • does not yet believe the goal to be adopted is the case;
    • there is no other goal G' that subsumes the goal G to be adopted. That is, G does not follow from G' (in combination with the agent's knowledge base).

    TODO: currently not yet supported because code that checks whether a 'similar' goal already exists in the goal base needs still to be created. Grammar GOAL.g also does not yet support adoptone action.

    Author:
    K.Hindriks
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • AdoptOneAction

        public AdoptOneAction(Selector selector,
              Update goal,
              Query template,
              InputStreamPosition source)
        Creates an AdoptOneAction action from an Update formula (the goal to be adopted) and a Query template that is assumed to subsume the goal to be adopted.
        Parameters:
        selector - The Selector of this action.
        goal - The goal, i.e. Update, to be adopted.
        template - TODO: template that may not occur in goal base if AdoptOne action is to be executed.
        source - The source code location of this action, if available; null otherwise.

      • getPrecondition

        public MentalStateCond getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
        Returns the precondition of this AdoptOneAction. The adoptone action can be performed if the goal to be adopted is not believed to be the case and the goal does not already follow from one of the goals in the goal base. TODO: Also, it should be checked whether a 'similar' goal does not yet exist.
        Overrides:
        getPrecondition in class AdoptAction
        Parameters:
        language - The KR language used for representing the precondition.
        Returns:
        A MentalStateCond that represents the action's precondition.

      • evaluatePrecondition

        public AdoptOneAction evaluatePrecondition(MentalState mentalState,
                                  Debugger debugger,
                                  boolean last)
        Checks whether the precondition of this AdoptOneAction holds. See also: getPrecondition(KRlanguage)).
        Overrides:
        evaluatePrecondition in class AdoptAction
        Parameters:
        mentalState - The MentalState in which the precondition is evaluated.
        debugger - The current debugger
        last - If this is the last possible variation we are trying to execute, e.g. after this there are no more possibilities and the action will fail.
        Returns:
        true if the precondition holds; false otherwise.
